description: Comprehensive dataset schema for GA timetable scheduling experiments

fields.name: run_id
fields.description: Unique UUID identifier for this experiment run

fields.name: timestamp_utc
fields.description: UTC timestamp when run was executed

fields.name: git_commit
fields.description: Short hash of repository HEAD commit

fields.name: seed
fields.description: RNG seed used for this run

fields.name: problem_features
fields.description: JSON object containing problem instance characteristics

fields.name: constraint_settings
fields.description: JSON object with all constraint configurations

fields.name: ga_params
fields.description: JSON object containing GA parameter settings

fields.name: fitness_final
fields.description: Final fitness score of best solution

fields.name: best_solution_violations
fields.description: Total hard constraint violations in best solution

fields.name: soft_satisfaction_pct
fields.description: Percentage of soft constraints satisfied (0-100)

fields.name: convergence_history
fields.description: JSON array of best fitness per generation

fields.name: runtime_seconds
fields.description: Total execution time in seconds

fields.name: process_exit_status
fields.description: Exit status of the GA run

fields.name: notes
fields.description: Free-text warnings or exception messages

fields.name: constraint_violations_breakdown
fields.description: Detailed breakdown of each constraint violation

fields.name: teacher_workload_stats
fields.description: Per-teacher workload statistics

fields.name: generations_completed
fields.description: Number of generations completed before termination

fields.name: early_stopped
fields.description: Whether GA stopped early due to convergence

fields.name: classes_scheduled
fields.description: Total number of classes successfully scheduled

fields.name: classes_required
fields.description: Total number of classes required to be scheduled

fields.name: scheduling_coverage_pct
fields.description: Percentage of required classes scheduled (0-100)

fields.name: hostname
fields.description: Machine hostname where run was executed

fields.name: python_version
fields.description: Python version used

fields.name: config_file_used
fields.description: Path to configuration file used
